name: FADNA Ranawara Tea
description:
Totally natural Caffeine Free Ranawara Herbal Tea offers many medicinal benefits :

  • According to Ayurvedaya it helps in controlling sugar disorders.
  • It is also effective in relieving urinary problems and stomach cleaning.
  • Promotes clear complexion and restoration of the skin to its natural glow.

name: Link Samahan
description:
The 100% authentic herbal formulation which is clinically proven.

  • Safe and effective preparation for relief of cold and catarrh related symptoms
  • Extensive clinical trials have confirmed that regular use helps to prevent 15
    common symptoms related to upper respiratory complications.
  • It has continued to dominate the market over 22 years, as the first-choice of
    Over-The-Counter preparations for instant cold remedy.

name: Link Sudantha
description:
Good oral hygiene is cardinal good health.

  • Link Sudantha toothpaste has been formulated, encompassing the effectiveness
    of nine specific, time tested herbal ingredients, using the most modern,
    development and manufacturing capabilities.
  • Specific combination of these plant extracts acts synergistically to specifically
    inhibit the harmful bacteria in the mouth, inhibit plaque formation and reduce
    gingival inflammations thereby prevent gum disease, prevent caries and stops
    bad breath.
  • Effectiveness of Sudantha has been already endorsed by millions of Sri Lankans
    as well as by scientific clinical studies.

name: Siddhalepa Ayurveda Balm
description:
Relief from colds, flu, headaches, toothache & common aches & pain.

  • 4 items per package
  • Net weight of 25g each

name: Supirivicky Toothpaste
description:
Keep Gums healthy & strong.

  • Prevent cavities.
  • Fights plaque & whitens teeth.
  • 4 items per package with a net weight of 75g each.

name: Sumudu Toothpaste
description:
Controls infections of the mouth.

  • Prevents bleeding & strengthens gums.
  • 4 items per package with a net weight of 75g each.

name: Kekulu Ayurveda Baby Soap
description:
Mild Ayurvedic herbal soap helps to keep your baby's skin healthy & soft.

  • 4 items per package.
  • Net weight of 75g each.

name: Visaka Ayurveda Soap
description:
Smoothes the skin & hair.

  • Controls dandruff, hair loss & hair damage.
  • 4 items per package.
  • Net weight of 75g each.

name: Ayur Head Massage Oil
description:
Stimulates hair groth & protect scalp.

  • Controls dandruff, hair loss & hair damage.
  • Makes hair healthy, Improves brightness of hair & minimises graying.
  • 1 item of 350 ml per package.

name: Ayur Body Massage Oil
description:
Provides relief from paralysis & high blood pressure.

  • High refreshing, relaxing & purifying.
  • 1 item of 350 ml per package.

name: Ayur Elixirs - Rejuvenation
description:
The Elixir (part of the oldest traditions of Ayurveda remedies) based on Ayurvedic plant
extracts are matured in Teak vats for 45 days for effective purity & goodness.

  • Elixir is used to balance three doshas.
  • Void of any synthetic ingredients or presevative

name: Ayur Slim Herbal Tea
description:
The tea helps shed unwanted pounds by controlling excessive appetites, normalizing
metabolism & aiding natural process of cleansing.

  • Aralu performs the laxative function, Bulu which is high in fiber improves
    metabolism & Nelli which is very high in Vitami.

name: Lakpeyawa Herbal Tea 06 pack
description:
Cures influenza, fever, cough, headaches & body pains.

  • Purifies the blood & relieves constipation.
  • 2 items per package.

name: Link Gotukola Tea
description:
Maintenance of health is one of the cardinal principles of ancient
Ayurvedic systems of health care. Gotukola, which is one of the
most popular herbs used in Asian households is renowned for
its culinary flavor and beneficial effects on health.

  • Link Natural Gotukola Tea is manufactured from naturally
    grown Gotukola herbs, in a hygienic environmentally friendly
    production facility
  • using modern state of the art process technologies, to
    preserve the medicinal
    properties and
    the unique flavor of Gotukola.

name: Link Natural Swastha Thriphala
description:
Thriphala is a bed rock of Ayurveda therapeutics with many postulated
benefits. Thriphala, the formulation of three dried fruits of Aralu (Terminalia
chebula Retz.), Bulu (Terminalia bellirica (Gaertn) Roxb.) and Nelli (Phyllanthus
emblica Linn.) has been used for thousands of years to promote health,
and longevity.

  • Link Natural Gotukola Tea is manufactured from naturally grown
    Gotukola herbs, in a hygienic environmentally friendly production
    facility
  • using modern state of the art process technologies, to preserve
    the medicinal
    properties and the unique flavor of Gotukola.

name: Link Musclegard
description:
Formula of the Link Musclegard was developed after detailed scrutiny of
the Ayurvedic literature and consultations with Ayurvedic practitioners
refer to recipes used for the muscle and joint ailments.

  • Link Musclegard is produced in the form of a cream made from a
    total extraction of 25 main plant species and formulated together
    with an excipient
  • It is a topical application to combat inflammatory conditions,
    painful swellings of skin, limbs, muscles and joints.

name: Link Five Herbs Tea
description:
To enable human body to combat stress and maintain a calm composure
during daily routines, several herbal teas or tisanes are available.

  • Combining the therapeutic requirements with palatability, the
    specialist indigenous physicians of Link Natural designed the
    ‘tea’ now called ‘Five Herbs’.
  • It comprises of the five herbs which individually and synergistically
    in combination act to give the desired counter to daily stress.
  • Serves as a pleasant hot beverage that calms the mind, body
    and nervous system.

name: Hair Care Cool
description: Refreshing Scented Ayurveda Hair Oil - 150ml

name: Link Natural Enriched Paspanguwa
description:
Link Natural Enriched Paspanguwa is developed
based on research carried out on ancient Ayurvedic
formulations used to combat cold and related symptoms.

  • The traditional popular formula, consisting of five
    plants are boiled in water to produce decoction,
    which is called ‘Peyawa’.
  • Many preparations of Paspanguwa containing these
    plants, are readily available in the market.
  • In the formulation of Link Enriched Paspanguwa, three
    other plants renowned for its medicinal activities have
    been added to strengthen its efficacy.
  • This new formulation provides synergistic and quick
    action for the same symptoms and ailments.

name:
Nature's Secrets Body Butter
Avocado and Sesame Oil (200ml)
description:
Avocado is a powerful natural skin healing moisturizer containing
essential vitamins, anti-oxidants and anti-ageing properties.

  • Combined with deep penetrating Sesame Oil, a natural skin
    cell regeneration enhancer.
  • This mineral oil free, Avocado based body butter nourishes
    the skin and enhances blood circulation., keeping your
    skin velvet soft and youthful.

name:
Nature's Secrets Herbal Heritage
Cinnamon Hand Cream (50ml)
description:
A unique natural blend of the finest aromatic Cinnamon Bark Oil from
Ceylon.

  • Nourishing Organic Virgin Coconut Oil from the tropics, fresh
    Aloe Vera, and hydrating Olive Oil in this creamy, mineral
    oil-free formula effectively provides relief from dry skin.
  • The rich texture leaves hands refreshingly soft, smooth and
    intensely moisturised.
  • The natural, distinctive aroma of Ceylon Cinnamon helps calm
    and soothe your senses.
